name: HOUND
description: HOUND is not a game in a conservative way, but a powerful engine. You play in a system that can create a new unique world for you to shape and conquer.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Service Pack 3 Processor: 2.4 GHz Intel Core 2 Duo Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 256 MB NVIDIA GeForce 8600 GTS DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 2 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card Additional Notes: Mouse, Keyboard
